items.name: Component_DataGridBehavior
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_DataGridBehavior
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_DataGridBehavior extends gs.Component_Visual
    class DataWrapper
        constructor: (data) ->
            @data = data
            @viewData = [yes, no, no, yes, no]
    
    class DataSource
        constructor: (source) ->
            @source = source || []
            @length = @source.length
            @wrappedSource = new Array(@source.length)
            @wrappedSource[i] = null for i in [0..@wrappedSource.length]
                
        set: (source) ->
            @source = source || []
            @length = @source.length
            @wrappedSource = new Array(@source.length)
            @wrappedSource[i] = null for i in [0..@wrappedSource.length]
            
        itemAt: (index) ->
            item = @wrappedSource[index]
            if !item
                item = new DataWrapper(@source[index])
                @wrappedSource[index] = item
                
            return item
    
        setItemAt:(index, data) ->
            if @wrappedSource[index]
                @wrappedSource[index].data = data
            @source[index] = data
            
    @accessors "dataSource", 
        set: (v) ->
            if v != @dataSource_.source
                @dataSource_.set(v)
                @resize()
        get: -> @dataSource_
        
    ###*
    * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used
    * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc.
    * 
    * @method onDataBundleRestore.
    * @param Object data - The data-bundle
    * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context.
    ###
    onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) ->
        @setupEventHandlers()
        
    ###*
    * The data-grid behavior component defines the logic for a data-grid. A data-grid
    * allows to display items from a associated data-source using a specified
    * item-template. Unlike a stack-layout, a data-grid is optimized to display even high amounts of items but they all
    * need to use the same item-template with same size.
    *
    * @module ui
    * @class Component_DataGridBehavior
    * @extends gs.Component_Visual
    * @memberof ui
    * @constructor
    * @params {Object} params - The params-object containing the data-grid settings.
    ###
    constructor: (params) ->
        super()
        @params = params || {}
        ###*
        * The item-template descriptor used for each item of the data-grid.
        * @property template
        * @type Object
        ###
        @template = @params.template
        
        ###*
        * The data-source used for the data-grid. Can be an array or a formula.
        * @property dataSource
        * @type Object[]|string
        ###
        @dataSource_ = null
        
        ###*
        * Stores the item-objects needed for rendering. They are created from the item-template.
        * @property items
        * @protected
        * @type gs.Object_Base[]
        ###
        @items = @params.items || []
        
        ###*
        * Numbers of columns.
        * @property columns
        * @type number
        ###
        @columns = @params.columns || 1
        
        ###*
        * Indicates if the data-grid is initialized and ready for rendering.
        * @property initialized
        * @protected
        * @type boolean
        ###
        @initialized = no
        
        ###*
        * Defines a horizontal and vertical spacing between items.
        * @property spacing
        * @default [0, 10]        
        * @type number[]
        ###
        @spacing = @params.spacing || [0, 0]
     
    ###*
    * Adds event-handlers for mouse/touch events
    *
    * @method setupEventHandlers
    ### 
    setupEventHandlers: ->
        gs.GlobalEventManager.on "mouseWheel", =>
            return if !@object.canReceiveInput()
            r = @object.dstRect
            
            if Rect.contains(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height, Input.Mouse.x - @object.origin.x, Input.Mouse.y - @object.origin.y)
                @updateScroll()
    
    ###*
    * Sets up the data-grid.
    *
    * @method setup
    ###   
    setup: ->
        if @object.dstRect.width == 1 then return
        @initialized = yes

        if !@template.size
            item = ui.UIManager.createControlFromDescriptor(@template.descriptor, @object)
            item.index = 0
            item.update()
            @template.size = [item.dstRect.width, item.dstRect.height]
            item.dispose()
            
        if @params.dataSource.exec
            @dataSource_ = new DataSource(ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(@object, @params.dataSource) || [])
        else
            @dataSource_ = new DataSource(@params.dataSource || [])
        
        @resize()
        
        @setupEventHandlers()
                
        super()
    
        @object.scrollableHeight = Math.max(0, @object.contentHeight - @object.dstRect.height)
     
    
    ###*
    * Scrolls to the end.
    *
    * @method scrollToEnd
    ###    
    scrollToEnd: ->
        @object.scrollOffsetY = @object.scrollableHeight
        
    ###*
    * Updates scrolling.
    *
    * @method updateScroll
    ###
    updateScroll: ->
        @object.scrollableHeight = Math.max(0, @object.contentHeight - @object.dstRect.height)
        if Input.Mouse.wheel <= -1
            @object.scrollOffsetY = Math.max(@object.scrollOffsetY - Input.Mouse.wheelSpeed * 0.1, 0)
           
        if Input.Mouse.wheel >= 1
            @object.scrollOffsetY = Math.min(@object.scrollOffsetY - Input.Mouse.wheelSpeed * 0.1, @object.scrollableHeight)
            
    
        @object.scrollOffsetY = Math.max(Math.min(@object.scrollOffsetY, @object.scrollableHeight), 0)
         
    ###*
    * Resizes the data-grid and creates the necessary display objects from the data-grid template.
    *
    * @method resize
    ###     
    resize: ->
        width = @object.dstRect.width
        height = @object.dstRect.height
        
        itemsX = @columns || 1
        itemsY = Math.ceil((height-@spacing[1]) / (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1])) + @columns+1
        totalItemsY = Math.ceil(@dataSource.length / @columns)
        
        item?.dispose() for item in @items
        @items = [] #new Array(itemsX * itemsY)
        
        for y in [0...itemsY]
            for x in [0...itemsX]
                index  = y * itemsX + x
                if index < @dataSource.length
                    item = ui.UIManager.createControlFromDescriptor(@template.descriptor, @object)

                    item.data[0] = @dataSource.itemAt(index).data                    
                    item.dstRect.x = @spacing[0] + x * (@template.size[0]+@spacing[0])
                    item.dstRect.y = @spacing[1] + y * (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1])
                    item.dstRect.width = @template.size[0]
                    item.dstRect.height = @template.size[1]
                    item.index = index
                    item.ui.viewData = @dataSource.itemAt(index).viewData
                    
                    @items[item.index] = item
                    @object.addObject(item)
                
        @object.scrollableHeight = @spacing[1] + totalItemsY * (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1]) - height
        @object.scrollOffsetY = 0
        @object.contentHeight = @spacing[1] + totalItemsY * (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1])

    itemAtIndex: (index) ->
        @items.first (item) -> item.index == index
        
    indexForItem: (item) -> item.index
        
    ###*
    * Updates the data-grid.
    *
    * @method update
    ###  
    update: ->
        super()
        
        if not @initialized
            @setup()
        
        scrollOffset = @object.scrollOffsetY
        offset = Math.floor((scrollOffset) / (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1])) * @columns
        i = offset
        itemIndex = 0
        itemsY = Math.ceil((@object.dstRect.height-@spacing[1]) /  (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1])) * @columns + @columns+1
        
        while i < Math.min(offset+itemsY, @dataSource.length)
            row = Math.floor(i / @columns)
            column = i % @columns
            item = @items[itemIndex]
            if item
                item.data[0] = @dataSource.itemAt(i).data
                if @object.clipRect
                    item.clipRect = @object.clipRect
                item.index = i
                item.ui.viewData = @dataSource.itemAt(i).viewData
                item.dstRect.x = @spacing[0] + column * (@template.size[0]+@spacing[0])
                item.dstRect.y = @spacing[1] + (row-(offset/@columns)) * (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1]) + (-scrollOffset % (@template.size[1]+@spacing[1]))
                item.visible = yes
                item.update()
                item.update()
                itemIndex++
              
            i++
        
        for j in [itemIndex...@items.length]
            if @items[j]
                @items[j].visible = no
                @items[j].update()
        
        
        
ui.Component_DataGridBehavior = Component_DataGridBehavior
